item.title: MIUI V12.1.2.0.RGHINXM Fastboot update for POCO X2 India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: POCO X2 India

Codename: phoenixin

Version: V12.1.2.0.RGHINXM | 11.0

Size: 3.1 GB

MD5: 36d0a67ec8d41a976fbbc466c7310d1d

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Noise could be heard when the screen was turned off in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to January 2021. Increased system security.
Stable MIUI based on Android 11

Download: Here
